mlr3torch 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    RReLU Activation Function

    mlr_pipeops_torch_rrelu.Rd

    Randomized leaky ReLU.

    Format

    R6Class inheriting from PipeOpTorch, PipeOp.

    Construction

    PipeOpTorchRReLU$new(id = "nn_rrelu", param_vals = list())

    • id :: character(1)
      The id for the object. The default is "nn_rrelu".

    • param_vals :: named list()
      List of hyperparameter settings to overwrite the initial values. Default is list().

    Input and Output Channels

    One input channel called "input" and one output channel called"output". For an explanation see PipeOpTorch.

    State

    The state is the value calculated by the public method shapes_out().

    Parameters

    • lower:: numeric(1)
      Lower bound of the uniform distribution. Default: 1/8.

    • upper:: numeric(1)
      Upper bound of the uniform distribution. Default: 1/3.

    • inplace :: logical(1)
      Whether to do the operation in-place. Default: FALSE.

    Fields

    Only fields inherited from PipeOpTorch/PipeOp{mlr3pipelines}].

    Methods

    Only methods inherited from PipeOpTorch/PipeOp{mlr3pipelines}].

    Internals

    Calls torch::nn_rrelu() when trained.

    Credit

    Parts of this documentation have been copied or adapted from the R package torch, that comes under the MIT license, which is included in the COPYRIGHTS file of the source package.
